name: @tps/kits-planning-suite
description: Planning Suite Kit for Aragon organizations

scripts.deploy:kit:mainnet: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x314159265dd8dbb310642f98f50c066173c1259b aragon contracts exec --network mainnet scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.deploy:kit:rinkeby: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile >/dev/null && aragon contracts exec --environment default scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.deploy:kit:staging: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.publish:mainnet: aragon apm publish patch $(npm run deploy:kit:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
scripts.publish:rinkeby: aragon apm publish patch $(npm run deploy:kit:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish patch $(npm run deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.publish:staging: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:staging | tail -n 1) --environment staging
scripts.test:docker: truffle compile && npm run docker:run && npm run docker:wait-gas && npm run deploy:devnet && npm run test:devnet && npm run docker:stop
scripts.test:local: truffle compile && npm run deploy:rpc && npm run test:rpc

author: Autark
